connectivity_and_communications.label: Connectivity and Communications
connectivity_and_communications.wirelesstech: Intel® Wi-Fi 6 AX201 (2x2) and Bluetooth® 5.2 wireless card, non-vPro®
connectivity_and_communications.ioports: 2 USB 3.1 Type-C® (Charge and video support, data transfer, power delivery); 1 USB 3.1 Gen 1; 1 headphone/microphone combo

display_specifications.label: Display Specifications
display_specifications.displaymet: 34.3 cm (13.5") diagonal, WUXGA+ (1920 x 1280), touch, IPS, narrow bezel, BrightView, 400 nits, 72% NTSC
display_specifications.display: 13.5" diagonal, WUXGA+ (1920 x 1280), touch, IPS, narrow bezel, BrightView, 400 nits, 72% NTSC

legal_information.label: Legal Information
legal_information.courtesydis: Product image may differ from actual product
legal_information.cpyright: © Copyright 2023 HP Development Company, L.P. The information contained herein is subject to change without notice. The only warranties for HP products and services are set forth in the express warranty statements accompanying such products and services. Nothing herein should be construed as constituting an additional warranty. HP shall not be liable for technical or editorial errors or omissions contained herein.
legal_information.trademark: Intel, Core and Intel vPro are trademarks or registered trademarks of Intel Corporation or its subsidiaries in the United States and other countries. Bluetooth is a trademark owned by its proprietor and used by HP Inc. under license. USB Type-C® and USB-C® are registered trademarks of USB Implementers Forum. SDXC is a registered trademark of SD-3C in the United States, other countries or both. ENERGY STAR is a registered trademark of the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency. © 2020 Google LLC All rights reserved. Google and the Google Logo are registered trademarks of Google LLC.

processor.label: Processor
processor.processortechno: Intel® Core™ i5 with vPro™ Technology
processor.processorname: Intel® Core™ i5-10310U (1.7 GHz base frequency, up to 4.4 GHz with Intel® Turbo Boost Technology, 6 MB L3 cache, 4 cores)

warranty.label: Warranty
warranty.wrntyfeatures: HP Services offers 3-year limited warranty and 90 day software support options depending on country and the SKU selected by the customer. Batteries have a default 3-year limited warranty. On-site service and extended coverage is also available with HP Care Pack Services, optional extended service contracts that go beyond the standard limited warranties. To choose the right level of service for your HP product, use the HP Care Pack Services Lookup Tool at: http://www.hp.com/go/cpc.

drives.label: Drives
drives.cloudserv: Google One™ (with 100 GB of storage and other exclusive benefits for 12 months)

dimensions.label: Dimensions

dimenmet.label: Minimum dimensions (W x D x H)

dimensions.dimenmet: 29.5 x 21.7 x 1.61 cm (with BrightView display); 29.5 x 21.7 x 1.67 cm (with anti-glare display)

dimenus.label: Minimum dimensions (W x D x H)

dimensions.dimenus: 11.6 x 8.5 x 0.6 in (with BrightView display); 11.6 x 8.5 x 0.7 in (with anti-glare display)

dimenpackmet.label: Package dimensions (W x D x H)

dimenpackus.label: Package dimensions (W x D x H)

security_management.label: Security Management
security_management.securitymgmt: Nano Security lock slot; Google H1 Security Chip; HP Sure View Reflect (optional)

battery_and_power.label: Battery and Power
battery_and_power.batterytype: HP Long Life 4-cell, 50 Wh Li-ion polymer
battery_and_power.batterylifeftnt: Battery is internal and not replaceable by customer. Serviceable by warranty. Fast charging 90% in 90 minutes.

footnotes.label: Footnotes
footnotes.tsfootnote_02: [2] Processor speed denotes maximum performance mode; processors will run at lower speeds in battery optimization mode.
footnotes.tsfootnote_03: [3] Intel® Turbo Boost performance varies depending on hardware, software and overall system configuration. See www.intel.com/technology/turboboost for more information.
footnotes.tsfootnote_05: [5] Wireless access point and Internet service required and sold separately. Availability of public wireless access points limited.
footnotes.tsfootnote_06: [6] Multi-core is designed to improve performance of certain software products. Not all customers or software applications will necessarily benefit from use of this technology. Performance and clock frequency will vary depending on application workload and your hardware and software configurations. Intel’s numbering, branding and/or naming is not a measurement of higher performance.
footnotes.tsfootnote_07: [7] Intel® Turbo Boost performance varies depending on hardware, software and overall system configuration. See http://www.intel.com/technology/turboboost/ for more information.
footnotes.tsfootnote_08: [8] Resolutions are dependent upon monitor capability, and resolution and color depth settings.
footnotes.tsfootnote_09: [9] HP Sure View Reflect is sold separately or as an optional feature that must be configured at purchase.
footnotes.tsfootnote_12: [12] Testing conducted by HP using Google Chrome OS power_LoadTest. Battery life will vary and the maximum capacity of the battery will naturally decrease with time and usage and battery optimization activation. See http://www.chromium.org/chromium-os/testing/power-testing for test details.
footnotes.tsfootnote_13: [13] Recharges the battery up to 90% within 90 minutes when the system is off or in standby mode. Power adapter with a minimum capacity of 65 watts is required. After charging has reached 50% capacity, charging will return to normal. Charging time may vary +/-10% due to System tolerance.
footnotes.tsfootnote_15: [15] HP Care Services are sold separately. Service levels and response times for HP Care Services may vary depending on your geographic location. Service starts on date of hardware purchase. Restrictions and limitations apply. For details, visit www.hp.com/go/cpc. HP services are governed by the applicable HP terms and conditions of service provided or indicated to Customer at the time of purchase. Customer may have additional statutory rights according to applicable local laws, and such rights are not in any way affected by the HP terms and conditions of service or the HP Limited Warranty provided with your HP Product.
footnotes.tsfootnote_16: [16] Based on US EPEAT® registration according to IEEE 1680.1-2018 EPEAT®. Status varies by country. Visit www.epeat.net for more information.
footnotes.tsfootnote_17: [17] External power supplies, power cords, cables and peripherals are not Low Halogen. Service parts obtained after purchase may not be Low Halogen.
footnotes.tsfootnote_18: [18] Based on US EPEAT® registration according to IEEE 1680.1-2018 EPEAT®. Status varies by country. Visit www.epeat.net for more information.
footnotes.tsfootnote_19: [19] External power supplies, power cords, cables and peripherals are not Low Halogen. Service parts obtained after purchase may not be Low Halogen.
footnotes.tsfootnote_22: [22] Google Drive offer is tied to this device and is non-transferable. Not available with Chrome Enterprise Upgrade enrollment. If this device is returned, the extra storage will be revoked. In order to redeem this offer, you will need to be on Chrome OS™ 23 or later. Internet access is required and not included. Additional information about storage plan refunds, renewals, cancellations and expiration is available at the Google website: https://support.google.com/chromebook/answer/2703646?hl=en
footnotes.tsfootnote_20: [20] Single Chrome Enterprise Upgrade included. Requires one-time setup, subscription, Google Admin Console, and your organization’s domain. Please see https://support.google.com/a/answer/60216
footnotes.tsfootnote_21: [21] Chrome Enterprise Upgrade is sold separately and requires one-time setup, subscription, Google Admin Console, and your organization’s domain. Please see https://support.google.com/a/answer/60216.
footnotes.tsfootnote_04: [4] Multicore is designed to improve performance of certain software products. Not all customers or software applications will necessarily benefit from use of this technology. Performance and clock frequency will vary depending on application workload and your hardware and software configurations. Intel’s numbering, branding and/or naming is not a measurement of higher performance.
footnotes.tsfootnote_11: [11] For storage drives, GB = 1 billion bytes. Actual formatted capacity is less. Up to 8.1 GB is not user available.

multimedia_and_input_devices.label: Multimedia and Input Devices
multimedia_and_input_devices.keybrd: Full-size island-style, backlit, spill and pick resistant keyboard
multimedia_and_input_devices.audiofeat: Audio by Bang & Olufsen, dual stereo speakers

compatibility.label: Compatibility
compatibility.accessories: HP Thunderbolt Dock 120W G2 2UK37AA; HP 3-Button Laser Mouse H4B81AA; HP Prelude Pro Recycle Backpack 1X644AA; HP 45W USB-C G2 Power Adapter 1MZ01AA; HP Nano Keyed Cable Lock 1AJ39AA

product_names.label: Product Names
product_names.prodlongnamespecsv2: Chrome OS™, 13.5", touch screen, Intel® Core™ i5, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, WUXGA+
product_names.prodshortnamespecs: HP Elite c1030 Chromebook Enterprise, 13.5", Intel® Core™ i5, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD
product_names.prodlongnamespecs: HP Elite c1030 Chromebook Enterprise, Chrome OS™, 13.5", touch screen, Intel® Core™ i5, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, WUXGA+

connection_and_communication.label: Connection and Communication
connection_and_communication.facet_interface: 2 USB 3.1 Type-C® (Charge and video support, data transfer, power delivery); 1 USB 3.1 Gen 1; 1 headphone/microphone combo

certification_and_compliance.label: Certification and Compliance
certification_and_compliance.facet_environ: ENERGY STAR® certified; EPEAT® registered; Low halogen

features.label: Features
features.facet_feat: touch screen; narrow bezel; Full-size island-style, backlit, spill and pick resistant keyboard; Fingerprint sensor; Nano Security lock slot; Google H1 Security Chip; HP Sure View Reflect (optional); Wi-Fi 6; 2 USB 3.1 Type-C® (Charge and video support, data transfer, power delivery); 1 USB 3.1 Gen 1; 1 headphone/microphone combo; Low halogen; TCO 8.0 Certified

legal_information.label: Legal Information
legal_information.lgldisclaimer_01: [1] Internet access required and sold separately. Some apps may require purchase.

footnotes.label: Footnotes
footnotes.msgfootnote_03: [3] Single Chrome Enterprise Upgrade included. Requires one-time setup, subscription, Google Admin Console, and your organization’s domain. Please see https://support.google.com/a/answer/60216
footnotes.srs_msgfootnote_07: [7] 3rd party licenses required and sold separately.
footnotes.msgfootnote_05: [5] Multi-Core is designed to improve performance of certain software products. Not all customers or software applications will necessarily benefit from use of this technology. Performance and clock frequency will vary depending on application workload and your hardware and software configurations. Intel’s numbering, branding and/or naming is not a measurement of higher performance.
footnotes.msgfootnote_06: [6] Based on internal testing vs. previous generation product with 802.11ac wireless LAN module.

key_selling_points.label: Key Selling Points
key_selling_points.ksp_01_headline_medium: Elegantly crafted for incredible Chrome OS experiences
key_selling_points.ksp_01_suppt_01_long: The Chromebook of the future is here with a stunning, micro-edge, 13.5" diagonal, 3:2 WUXGA+ screen optimized for the web, an ultrathin aluminum 360° design with tablet mode.
key_selling_points.ksp_02_headline_medium: Enterprise-grade security and manageability made simple
key_selling_points.ksp_01_suppt_01_short: Enjoy a view of the future on the stunning, micro-edge, 13.5" diagonal 3:2 WUXGA+ screen in an ultrathin, all-aluminum design.
key_selling_points.ksp_02_suppt_01_short: Easily control what you share with a built-in webcam privacy switch. Simplify life for IT and save time and money with Chrome Enterprise Upgrade[3] manageability and security.
key_selling_points.ksp_03_suppt_01_short: Mastering cloud-based multi-tasking and meetings is a breeze with an Intel® processor.[5] Connect from virtually anywhere with HP Extended Range Wireless LAN.[6]
key_selling_points.ksp_02_suppt_01_long: Easily control what you share with a built-in webcam privacy switch. Simplify life for IT and save time and money with Chrome Enterprise Upgrade[3] manageability and security.
key_selling_points.ksp_03_headline_medium: Designed for always-on, powerful productivity and collaboration
key_selling_points.ksp_03_suppt_01_long: Mastering cloud-based multi-tasking and meetings across a ton of tabs is simple with an Intel® processor.[5] Access data, collaborate in real-time, and connect from virtually anywhere with HP Extended Range Wireless LAN.[6]

features_group_1.label: Features Group 1
features_group_1.feature_01_suppt_01_medium: Get a low-maintenance experience with the automatic software updates and virus protection of the Chrome OS.
features_group_1.feature_01_headline_02_statement: Universal connectivity and charging with USB-C™
features_group_1.feature_01_suppt_02_medium: Use the USB-C™ port to access and charge your USB-C™ accessories from your Chromebook™ or charge your Chromebook™ from any USB-C™ adapter.
features_group_1.feature_01_suppt_04_medium: Take learning in new directions with access to the Google Play™ Store and Android™ apps, which include thousands of instantly shareable and easily manageable innovative education apps.
features_group_1.feature_01_headline_04_statement: Apps and content for expanded learning
features_group_1.feature_01_suppt_03_medium: Help prevent degradation, water intrusion, and tampering with a keyboard that resists picks, minor spills, and key removal.

family_positioning.label: Family Positioning
family_positioning.family_positioning_headline_short: Collaboration and connectivity in more places.
family_positioning.family_positioning_overview_medium: Attractive notebooks with Google's Chrome operating system support the large and expanding ecosystem of collaboration and productivity apps.

product_description.label: Product Description
product_description.proddes_overview_medium: Effortlessly work on the cloud with the captivating HP Elite c1030 Chromebook Enterprise, It has an edge-to-edge screen, integrated fingerprint sensor, and Chrome OS[3] manageability and security.
product_description.proddes_overview_short: The simplicity of a Chromebook, powerfully and beautifully reimagined for business
product_description.proddes_overview_extended: Effortlessly work on the cloud with the captivating HP Elite c1030 Chromebook Enterprise. Engage your senses on a stunning edge-to-edge screen and login fast with the fingerprint sensor. Full Chrome OS[3] manageability and security make IT easy.

document.collection_full_title: 9 tips that make working from wherever a breeze
document.description: The office is evolving, and hybrid work, in one form or another, is here to stay. So your strategy needs to incorporate technology, devices, solutions, and services that work seamlessly across individuals and teams. See the nine points below for a quick guide to enabling productive work experiences anywhere.
document.full_title: 9 tips that make working from wherever a breeze
document.search_keyword: peripherals, hybrid work, work happy ABM, accessories, ecosystems;4AA8-2643ENW

document.collection_full_title: MIL-STD-810 Testing for HP Business PCs
document.description: Most HP Business Notebook & Desktop PCs, Z/Workstations, Cloud and Engage Systems undergo MIL-STD-810 test procedures as a way to demonstrate product quality & reliability. Conditions/specs outlined in the MIL-STD-810 test methods are not covered under the HP Limited Warranty.
document.full_title: MIL-STD-810 Testing for HP Business PCs
document.search_keyword: testing;Quality;Product testing;Product quality;MIL-STD-810;MIL-STD testing;MIL-STD;HP product reliability, HP Total Test Process (TTP);HP Accidental Damage Protection Care Pack;4AA6-0823ENW

asset.asset_title: HP Computing with the Environment in Mind (Channel Partner version)
asset.key_word: HP computers PC laptop notebook recycling HP Planet Partners
asset.asset_description: HP PC products help you realize the power of computing while reducing your environmental footprint. HP is a leader in EPEATÂ® and ENERGY STARÂ® products minimizes the amount of raw material that goes into making HP products.
